event_summary: Winter sports championship featuring skiing, snowboarding, and ice hockey with participants from 35 countries.
commentary_summary: Sports analysts praised the excellent facilities, fair competition, and strong sportsmanship displayed throughout.
next_event_plan: Add extreme winter sports categories and improve accessibility for athletes with disabilities
event_highlight: Record-breaking downhill skiing performance and first-ever tie in ice hockey finals
event_object: To promote winter sports and foster international athletic cooperation in cold climate regions
event_conclusion: Crowned 50 champions, set 12 new records, and achieved zero major injuries
event_conclusion_overall: Outstanding sporting event that demonstrated world-class organization and thrilling competitions
next_event_suggestion: Establish training camps before competitions and add cultural exchange programs
